text: @JoshNBCNews @PressSec @PressSec said when #Trump said Kung Flu, he was only kidding?  It was contradicted later, she has proven herself a liar over and over again. The WH lie the death rate  #COVID19 is 0.05%.  Simple math proved her malfeasance in perpetuating the falsehood...the Death rate is 4.96%.
